blocks.section_text: :infinity: *Welcome to Workato CI/CD*
Please select an option:
*Project Configuration*: Manage project configurations for CI/CD.
*Build and Deploy*: Build and Deploy a Project or Manifest
*Release to Prod*: Release a project or manifest to Production
:infinity: *Welcome to Workato CI/CD*
Please select an option:
*Project Configuration*: Manage project configurations for CI/CD.
*Build and Deploy*: Build and Deploy a Project or Manifest
:infinity: *Welcome to Workato CI/CD*
Please select an option:
*Project Configuration*: Manage project configurations for CI/CD.
*Build and Deploy*: Build and Deploy a Project or Manifest
*Release to Prod*: Release a project or manifest to Production
*Admin Options*: Advanced Options for Admins
:infinity: *Workato CI/CD Advanced Options*
Please select an option:
*Pipeline Configuration*: Manage pipelines to deploy and promote a package.
*Property Migration*: Manage properties to be migrated during deployments.
*Deployments:* Track environment specific CI/CD deployments.
=_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"6f891857","path":["recipe_management"]}').is_true? ? "*Recipe Management*: Manage recipes of a project within any environment." : ""
=_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"6f891857","path":["deploy_release"]}').is_true? ? "*Deploy Release*: Deploy an existing release to relevant environments." : ""

=_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"6f891857","path":["deploy_unreleased_package"]}').is_true? ? "*Deploy Unreleased Package*: Deploy a package version to non-production environments." : ""
=_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"6f891857","path":["manage_user_access"]}').is_true? ? "*Manage User Access*: Manage role based access for users" : ""
:infinity: *Welcome to Workato CI/CD*
Please select an option:
*Project Configuration*: Manage project configurations for CI/CD.
*Pipeline Configuration*: Manage pipelines to deploy and promote a package.
*Pipeline Execution*: Track CI/CD pipeline executions.
*Property Migration*: Manage properties to be migrated during deployments.
*Deployments:* Track environment specific CI/CD deployments.
=_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"6f891857","path":["recipe_management"]}').is_true? ? "*Recipe Management*: Manage recipes of a project within any environment." : ""
=_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"6f891857","path":["deploy_release"]}').is_true? ? "*Deploy Release*: Deploy an existing release to relevant environments." : ""

=_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"6f891857","path":["deploy_unreleased_package"]}').is_true? ? "*Deploy Unreleased Package*: Deploy a package version to non-production environments." : ""
=_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_variable","line":"6f891857","path":["manage_user_access"]}').is_true? ? "*Manage User Access*: Manage role based access for users" : ""

block.comment: Has more than 3 environments and use the list pipeline feature to run

code.comment: Trigger on Workbot for Slack command "workato cicd start" to present different options.
